author: brianp
msg: Reverting the Sparc v8plus check because it broke other things

author: brianp
msg: When compiling on an UltraSparc, ask the assembler to support
v8plus instructions.  (The point of this is to enable us to use
the atomic compare-and-swap instruction in inline assembly code.)

msg: Add back >>2 that was unintentionally removed in previous commit.

author: trawick
msg: template is a reserved word in C++, so don't use it
